question: What notable water well is located in the heart of Hail?
true_answer: The notable water well located in the heart of Hail is Bi’r Samah.
asked_question_translated: Milyen nevezetes vízkút található Hail szívében?
answer: Hail szívében a nevezetes vízkút az „Hatim Siddique Well”, más néven "Al-Hatim Well".
answer_translated_eng: Hail from the heart of the famous water well of the "Hatim Siddique Well", also known as "Al-Hatim Well".
